ygData.subject: [eqbards]Anyone tried this new MS commander with EQ yet?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, You know, I haven t played EQ in weeks, what with the nerfs causing the boredom of the EverCamp mentality to become excruciatingly apparent to me,
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

You know, I haven't played EQ in weeks, what with the nerfs causing the
boredom of the EverCamp mentality to become excruciatingly apparent to me,
but I am upgrading my PC this weekend (after 3 years) and I saw an
interesting new item that's on the market.

Anyone else noticed the Microsoft Strategic Commander? I saw it and became
curious. Come to find out they are hyping ut as not only a RTS controller,
but a a role playing controller as well. Hmmmmm.... It even comes with 3
pre-configured control sets for Asheron's Call (magic user, fighter with
magic, and warrior or something to that effect).

Sooooo, my question was, has anyone tried this thing with EQ? If so, how is
it? I know that several people on the list use other game controllers to
play, wondered if anyone had checked this one out.

Thanks,
Weiland
Perpetually 30 something bard of E. Marr
Currently on hiatus from the doldrums, but losing the will rapidly
